## ResolveOptions.alias property

A list of module alias configurations or an object which maps key to value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
alias?: {
        [index: string]: string | false | string[];
    } | {
        alias: string | false | string[];
        name: string;
        onlyModule?: boolean;
    }[];
```
